rooms.description: An inviting space with natural lighting, compliant with Vastu for auspicious entrance.
Spacious living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and green ventilation. Designed to maximize natural light while ensuring privacy with smart shading solutions.
Integrated dining space adjacent to the living area. Uses locally sourced materials for sustainability and Vastu compliant placement.
Modern kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural light, and Vastu-aligned placement for auspicious cooking.
Cozy guest room designed with eco-friendly insulation and floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring privacy and natural light.
Quiet study area with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows. Adheres to Vastu guidelines by ensuring proper directional alignment.

openings.description: Reinforced door with natural finishes that enhances security while aligning with Vastu principles.
Large floor-to-ceiling window offering panoramic view and maximizing solar gains, treated with low-emissivity glass.

rooms.description: Expansive master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows for privacy and abundant natural light. Designed in accordance with Vastu guidelines for health and harmony.
Additional bedroom featuring eco-friendly flooring and floor-to-ceiling windows. Vastu principles ensure proper energy flow.
Additional bedroom designed with a focus on maximizing light and ventilation. Features eco-friendly interiors in line with Vastu.
Modern bathroom designed for efficient water use with low-flow fixtures. Follows Vastu principles in its orientation.
Private outdoor space designed for relaxation and natural ventilation. Incorporates local stone and recycled wood in its construction.
Convenience bathroom for guests with water-efficient fixtures and eco-friendly design elements.

openings.description: Well-placed door leading to the balcony ensuring a seamless flow between indoor and outdoor spaces, designed with eco-friendly wood finishes.
